title: Agreement and disagreement
body: So I was team up with a player who starts talking about some Asia country political event, I ignore him as usual. However, I got about five players (two from my side) form this country with some disagreement. Soon chat is flood by different language and those two team numbers start to feeding due to different political stander so that that player could suffer more. I know this is a free speech environment, but this causes me to have a REALLY BAD GAME. I wonder will any of those players get banned? I reported them of course.

replies.body:
But they might not be Asian, did you ever consider that?

Essentially the response you'll get on here man, nothing will be done, status quo will be protected.
